translations: v．使惊吓，使吃惊：突然地或意外地使某人感到惊讶或害怕。
· The sudden noise startles the baby.
突然的噪音吓到了婴儿。

sentences.sentence: "I got up slowly," he explained, "because if I make a quick move it startles them."
sentences.translation: “我起身很慢。”他解释说，“因为如果我动作快，他们就会受到惊吓。”

sentences.sentence: This unexpected display of color startles or confuses the predator and provides the would-be prey with an opportunity to escape.
sentences.translation: 这种意想不到的颜色表现会吓到捕食者或使其迷惑，并为潜在的猎物提供逃跑的机会。

sentences.sentence: His movement startles her and she jumps.
